answerText: platypus[10] This net of jelly-filled pores in the head of sharks is the organs of electroreception in that species. They are named for their Italian discoverer.

subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about electroreceptors in various animals, for 10 points each: [10] This mammal has a modified cranial nerve that allows it to detect electrical signals. These unusual mammals also lay eggs and have a notable duck-billed variety.
